# Requisition Management System - Copilot Instructions

This workspace contains a Next.js application for internal requisition management.

## Project Overview
- **Framework**: Next.js 15 with App Router
- **Language**: TypeScript
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS
- **Data Storage**: Local Storage (no backend)

## Key Components
- Layout with sidebar navigation
- Requisition creation form with validation
- Requisition viewing interface
- Dashboard with statistics

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for all components
- Follow Next.js App Router conventions
- Apply Tailwind CSS for styling
- Maintain responsive design principles
- Use local storage for data persistence

## File Structure
- `app/layout.tsx` - Root layout with sidebar
- `app/components/Sidebar.tsx` - Navigation component
- `app/requisition/create/page.tsx` - Form component
- `app/requisitions/page.tsx` - List view component
- `app/dashboard/page.tsx` - Dashboard component

## Form Requirements
- Validate required fields
- Use proper TypeScript types
- Implement local storage for persistence
- Match the provided UI design

## Styling Notes
- Dark sidebar with blue accent
- Clean form design with proper spacing
- Responsive layout for all screen sizes
- Consistent color scheme throughout
